trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error is made adding a <see cref="T:System.Net.Cookie" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Net.Cookie" /> 加入 <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieContainer" /> 卻發生錯誤時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown if an attempt is made to <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer.Add%2A> a <xref:System.Net.Cookie> with length greater than <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer.MaxCookieSize%2A> to a <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試將會擲回這個例外狀況<xref:System.Net.CookieContainer.Add%2A><xref:System.Net.Cookie>長度大於<xref:System.Net.CookieContainer.MaxCookieSize%2A>至<xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>。

trans-unit.source: **Associated Tips**
trans-unit.target: **相關的秘訣**

trans-unit.source: **Make sure the cookie size does not exceed the maximum allowed by the cookie container.**
trans-unit.target: **請確定 cookie 大小未超過 cookie 容器允許的最大。**

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to add a <xref:System.Net.Cookie> with length greater than <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer.MaxCookieSize%2A> to a <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將長度超過 <xref:System.Net.Cookie> 的 <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer.MaxCookieSize%2A> 加入至 <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>，就會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The default maximum cookie size is 4096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Cookie 大小的預設最大值為 4096 位元組。

trans-unit.source: **When setting the Name property for a cookie, make sure the value is not a null reference or empty string.**
trans-unit.target: **當設定 cookie 的 Name 屬性，請確定該值不是 null 參考或空字串。**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Cookie.Name%2A> property must be initialized before using an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Cookie> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Net.Cookie.Name%2A> 類別的執行個體之前，必須先初始化 <xref:System.Net.Cookie> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following characters are reserved and cannot be used for this attribute value: equal sign, semicolon, comma, new line (\n), carriage return (\r), tab (\t).
trans-unit.target: 下列字元是保留字，無法用於這個屬性值中：等號 (=)、逗號 (,)、新行 (\n)、換行符號 (\r)，和定位點 (\t)。

trans-unit.source: The dollar sign ($) character cannot be the first character.
trans-unit.target: 第一個字元不能是貨幣符號 ($) 字元。

trans-unit.source: **When setting the Port property for a cookie, make sure the value is valid and enclosed in double quotes.**
trans-unit.target: **當設定 cookie 的 Port 屬性時，請確定該值是有效的而且必須置於雙引號內。**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Cookie.Port%2A> attribute restricts the ports to which a cookie may be sent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Cookie.Port%2A> 屬性可以限制傳送 Cookie 的通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: The default value means no restriction.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為沒有限制。

trans-unit.source: Setting the property to an empty string ("") restricts the port to the one used in the HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 將這個屬性設定為空字串 ("") 會將通訊埠限制為 HTTP 回應中所使用的通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the value must be a string in quotation marks that contains port values delineated with commas.
trans-unit.target: 否則該值必須是置於引號內的字串，其中包含以逗號區隔的通訊埠值。

trans-unit.source: **When setting the Value property for a cookie, make sure the value is not null.**
trans-unit.target: **當設定 cookie 的 Value 屬性時，請確定該值不是 null。**

trans-unit.source: The following characters are reserved and cannot be used for this property: semicolon, comma.
trans-unit.target: 下列字元是保留字，無法用於這個屬性：分號 (;) 和逗號 (,)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor for <xref:System.Net.CookieException>.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式<xref:System.Net.CookieException>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieException" /> class with specific values of <paramref name="serializationInfo" /> and <paramref name="streamingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <paramref name="serializationInfo" /> 和 <paramref name="streamingContext" /> 的指定值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to set up custom serialization.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您設定自訂序列化。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要以資料填入的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，指定這個序列化的目的地。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance with the data needed to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieException" />.
trans-unit.target: 以序列化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 所需的資料填入 <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieException" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的任何物件<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>自動追蹤和序列化格式子。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance with the data needed to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieException" />.
trans-unit.target: 以序列化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 所需的資料填入 <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieException" /> 執行個體。
